text:
[Verse]
Got my eyes on the night
Chasing dreams taking flight
City lights glowing bright
Everything feels so right

[Verse 2]
Stars above in the sky
Wishing hard flying high
Never know till we try
Golden dreams never die

[Chorus]
Dreams and stars
Moonlit bars
Hearts in cars
Not too far

[Verse 3]
Dancing free in the dark
Footsteps light leave a mark
In the park bright spark
Every beat we embark

[Chorus]
Dreams and stars
Moonlit bars
Hearts in cars
Not too far

[Verse 4]
Holding hands feel the thrill
Mountain tops all so still
Chasing dreams pay the bill
Every night feel the chill
title: Dreams and Stars
